category.name: Active Workspace
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: WRKFLW_hide_subsequent_task_errors
preference.preference_description: Deactivates the visibility of error/notification message on UI when the subsequent task in the workflow has failed. Valid values are: * true: the message is not visible for the above-mentioned Workflow types. This is the default value. * false: the message is visible for the above-mentioned Workflow types.
